Title: Executive Financial Consultant at finexis advisory Pte Ltd
Summary: In Year 2012, Jiale made the leap that created a seismic shift in his entire life: To leave the comfortable 4-year bachelor at the prestigious Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU) on the very first day, for the Insurance Industry. This allows him full independence to determine his own market value, dictate his own working hours, and be part of something larger than himself. It has been his best decision yet.  Throughout his 7-year career as an adviser, Kah Lok found that clients and the people he met asked him similar questions. He figured the best way to help his clients and the community was to film the answers in a series of videos so that others could access the knowledge and information they required 24/7.  That led to the creation of MONEYMAP, where he filmed a series of three-minute educational videos revolving around financial literacy for the benefit of the general public. As of May 2019, he produced 40 such videos. Utilizing the power of social media, he has shared his videos on various platforms such as Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and LinkedIn.   Through the exposure of his content and brand online, and by regularly keeping his clients updated via channels such as WhatsApp broadcast group, he has instilled greater confidence and trust in his professionalism.   The combination of initiatives focused on creating value for the community has elevated his business model from push to a client-attracting pull-model with clear measurable outcomes.   He has since clocked 113 five-star recommendations on his Facebook Page and his business is now 100% powered by passive referrals and existing clients only.

Title: Senior Manager Financial Services at Professional Investment Advisory Services Pte Ltd
Summary: Senior Financial Services Manager in Apex Premier, an organisation representing PIAS (Professional Investment Advisory Services).   In Apex Premier, the core focus of our business is Wealth Management. Working with Apex allows you to tap onto our expertise from wealth protection, preservation, accumulation to distribution. Our insistence on quality advice ensures only the best for our clients.   We are Apex because of one simple belief - "The Relentless Pursuit of Excellence".   Apex also conducts public and corporate educational seminars on a whole array of wealth and financial matters. We've conducted more than 2,000 seminars since 2007 for Ministries, Statutory Boards, MNCs, various institutions and companies.  Approximately 300 seminars and corporate talks done on a yearly basis, with the objective to improve financial literacy. Popular topics include Retirement Planning, Investment Portfolio Construction, Market Outlooks, Risk Management Strategies, Estate planning etc. You’re certainly more than welcome to join us at our monthly in-house talks! (I'd like to extend this invitation to existing advisors as well. HMU if you wish to have a feel of how we run our seminars).   I'm looking for highly motivated individuals who possess strong integrity and personal ethics. To fit into the org's culture, wealth management professionals must also have a burning desire for financial success while achieving work life balance. In Apex Premier, we believe in empowering our clients with the relevant knowledge to make sound financial decisions. Intensive training and coaching sessions are absolutely compulsory combined with a full-fledged 90 days program run by a veteran with more than 20 years experience in the industry.  "If it's meant to be, it's up to me."   Success doesn't come to you. You go to it. If you're looking to be ahead of the rat race in today's volatile, uncertain, complex & ambiguous business world, PM me for more details.

Title: Marketing Manager at ERA Real Estate
Summary: Jhohan is a successful and dedicated real estate broker with one of Singapore’s top real estate agencies, ERA. He is the leading member of a results-driven real estate team oriented towards success in the industry.   Jhohan has supported numerous clients through the process of making the right property decisions with a focus on putting their needs first, and matching the right buyer with the right seller. He has helped many clients sell and purchase their dream properties backed by solid investment strategies and has served big-name clients such as Mediacorp and the Vice President of Credit Suisse.  He combines an unparalleled knowledge of the property market and acute judgement with 21st century digital marketing techniques to deliver extensive coverage for his clients.  In his free time, Jhohan is a serial investor who is well-versed in real estate and stock investments. He has been mentored by top experts with decades of property and investment experience. He also co-founded Flying Chalks, a study abroad networking platform for international students which currently operates across South Korea, Philippines, Vietnam, Malaysia, and Singapore. In his previous role as Chief Operating Officer and Chief Marketing Officer, he oversaw the acquisition of over 10,000 users on the platform within just 9 months.  Jhohan graduated from the Singapore Management University (SMU) in 2016 with a Bachelor of Business Management, majoring in Operation Management and Marketing.

Title: Singapore Real Estate Property Agent. Property investment. Sell, Buy, Rent, Lease, Manage and Decoupling properties.
Summary: For years i have been exploring for the most enjoyable and satisfying experience for my clients engaging real estate service. And IMHO, i realise it is done through a client's interest first, providing accurate info and hassle free approach. Below are the summary of what i mean.  I serve you as Seller:  1) provide valuation report, past transactions of comparable properties (within the property and nearby). 2) check eligibility for selling and seller stamp duty if any. 3) advertise on various platforms for maximum market exposure for your sale listing. 4) updated on every viewings and conduct it with professionalism and care on your property. 5) negotiate for best offer with your upmost interest as priority.  I serve you as Buyer: 1) provide valuation report, past transactions of comparable properties (within the property and nearby). 2) check eligibility for buying and buyer stamp duty if any. 3) calculate sales proceed and best options to adopt, ie. decoupling. 4) conduct search and match listings on new launches and resale. 5) negotiate for best offer with your upmost interest as priority.  I serve you as Landlord: 1) provide valuation report, past transactions of comparable properties (within the property and nearby). 2) check eligibility for rent (only for HDB). 3) advertise on various platforms for maximum market exposure for your sale listing. 4) updated on every viewings and conduct it with professionalism and care on your property. 5) negotiate for best offer with your upmost interest as priority.  Contact me at +65 8101 8106 if you wish to engage any of the services above.

Title: My dream is to help women rediscover happiness.
Summary: Hi, I’m Adelynn.  Through my own self-discovery journey, I've found that the essence of authentic happiness always comes from within - and when we live a life of meaning and contribute our gifts to the world, we can express our soul-happiness fully and effortlessly.   As a founder and Chief Happiness Officer of Soul Happy People, my WHY is pretty simple: I want to spread joy and happiness in the workplace and everyday lives. It's my passion to inspire women to rediscover happiness, to believe in themselves, to chase dreams, and to be the “Chight” - meaning to be the change and be the light they wish to see in THEIR own lives. I enjoy bringing people together, and curating meaningful and fun events or experiences to inspire hope.    The world is my school and also my playground, and I creatively design my own curriculum.    I spent the last 20 years BEING the change, change was constant for me, and through the colourful adventures, I’ve collected many “badges”. Some of my unique expertise include Graphic Design, Jewellery Design, Marketing and Branding, Make-up artistry, Style and Image Consultancy, Right Brain Training, Event Organising, and an unconventional mom to a 10-year-old daughter. I embrace change with enthusiasm and each of them adds bling to my life’s palette.   Bringing people together is one of my natural gifts, I believed a collective effort makes greater impact.   Happiness is contagious - let’s pass the flame and spread the joy!

Summary: Graduating with an academic background in Landscape Architecture, Avim has been involved in numerous roles and projects in Singapore and overseas. Rising through the ranks to an Associate Director within the 6 years of professional practice, he has successfully nurtured a team of vibrant creative young minds and spearheaded numerous award-winning projects.   In the Year 2017, Avim decided to step out of his comfort zone and pursue his passion in real estate. Leveraging on his expertise and adopting an active learner mind in this new arena, he constantly challenges himself to break new grounds and set new targets.  Prioritising his clients’ interest at the highest level of integrity, Avim has worked hard and established mutual trust and confidence among his clients and company.  Avim started off from an Associate Marketing Executive and within a year, he was promoted to Marketing Manager in November 2017, Senior Marketing Manager in February 2018 and, eventually to Marketing Director in June 2018. He went on to qualify as an ERA Million Dollar Club Achiever in February 2018. This award is to honour outstanding achievements for accumulating S$5 million worth of property transactions or S$100k or more in earned commission within a 12-month period.   Positioning himself as a client's advisor, Avim values every given opportunity and relationships. Title: ERA Realty network pte ltd
Summary: R PRAMEELA  +65-96320441 | prameelarathanan@gmail.com YOUR TRUSTED ADVISOR ON ALL THINGS REAL ESTATE  I have been flying around the world as a flight crew for the past 15 years and have learnt about cultures, customs and the business climate in many parts of the world. I have also gained insight into how people with different worldviews think about investment and home ownership.  Real estate has always been my passion and buying a property is the largest purchase that a typical Singaporean can make in his or her lifetime.  My love for helping people was formalised through a Master degree in Professional Counselling, and I am therefore equipped to help clients work through the inevitable stress of buying or selling property. My focus is to facilitate a smooth transaction for all parties but my duty is always to negotiate the best price for my client. I apply psychological and marketing skills to my natural way with people to find the best deal possible when buying or selling property.  I am guided by strong ethical and moral values, and I seek to build a trusting, professional relationship with all clients. This philosophy of being in-sync with my clients and understanding them from their perspective, is what truly differentiates me from others in the real estate industry. Since there is hardly ever a single, perfect solution to a problem, I prefer to work on my clients’ needs and budget to formulate a plan that can achieve their real estate objective. Finally, not everyone who is contemplating putting up their home for sale might follow through with it. But the reality is that up-to-date knowledge is necessary to make an informed decision. I pride myself on being there to provide that knowledge, and am always just a call away at 96320441

Title: Branch Division Director ERA at ERA Real Estate
Summary: Paul is a serial entrepreneur. He started his first business at a tender age of 19, selling fashion sunglasses from a push-cart located at  the former World Trade Center. The business then grew into one of the biggest fashion sunglass retail  in Singapore with several outlets in popular shopping malls in town. The business was subsequently converted into full fledged optical stores with its revenue tripled within a year.   In 2010, Paul sold his optical business and decided to join the real estate industry. Armed with a Diploma in Real Estate Management previously, Paul decided to give it a shot in the industry. In the first year that he joined, he was named the ‘Top Rookie’ and ‘Top Producer’ of Huttons Real Estate Group in 2009 and then in 2010 subsequently. In 2011, he was awarded the 'Singapore’s Best Salesperson' Bronze award by SAEA (Singapore Accredited Estate Agencies).  With a passion for creating businesses, he saw a gap in the real estate industry - a missing collaborative platform for agents to collaborate and work as a team, and hence started AgentMe, a social collaborative network for real estate. The app had seen great traction and support from the industry and was handed over to the co-founder.   Currently an award-winning real estate sales agent with ERA, Paul specialises in high net worth private properties located in District 9, 10 and 11.   Paul's extensive experience includes:  - Retail Management - Real Estate Development Sales - Social Media Marketing and Campaign advertising - Patent Drafting and Trademark Registration - Product Design and Development - Software Project Management - Business Management
